data.name: ChangeLog.Text
data.value:
v2.5.0.0 - Added BB10-Shrink - shrink your OS/Blitz folder before installing
v2.4.9.7b - Added setting to seperate ALX/COD files during shrink - Added shortcut to refresh OS folders in dropdown list - F5 - Added Shrink All button to BlackBerry apps group - Added T-Mobile Error Translator to Shrink options - Updated Device selections - Various code optimizations to Select All/None, Save/Load Settings
v2.4.9.7a - Removed broken links - Updated download link - VIP version is now available to all
v2.4.9.7 - Added Batch OTA downloading to OTA Downloader - Added ability to load a batch OTA download list from file - Added ability to choose what device/OS to show when downloading OTAs - Added ability to install .apk files to a connected Android device in the PlayBook tab - Added option to Convert .apk(s) on drag/drop in PlayBook tab (otherwise they're added to list for install to an Android device) - Fixed LiveShrink - Fixed issue with OTA creation when adding files via the button - Fixed Move COD Files to Save To folder in Create-A-JAD - Fixed Convert to .alx when complete in OTA Downloader - Improved OTA Downloading code - Organized Shrunk files list to seperate .alx files and .cod files - Updated Shrink for Verizon Name ID - Updated PlayBook APK conversion and BAR signing tools - Updated JavaLoader.exe to latest from BlackBerry JDE 7.1.0 - Updated Help info
v2.4.9.6 - Added ability to sign BAR files in the APK Converter within PlayBook Tab - Added Shrinking for BlackBerry Travel and Finnish language - Added password request for "Install to connected device" option in Create-A-JAD for passworded devices - Added ability to save shrunk files list (for help with shrink errors) - Fixed DPI Awareness - Removed Install A Hybrid tab, any future implementation (if any) will be in Build-A-Hybrid tab
v2.4.9.5 - Added Install after completion to APK Converter (previously disabled) - Added Install to connected device option to Create-A-JAD - Added @BerryReview and @OpenSourceBB as Show Tweets options - Added Delete Vendor.xml button to Start tab - Added BlackBerry Mobile Conferencing shrink item - Disabled shrinking of Latin font for OS7/7.1 as it was causing reboots (won't shrink even when checked) - Fixed Screenshots for newer devices as well as uploading and tweeting screenshots - Fixes to PlayBook tab and improved error handling - Minor skin fixes - New icon - thanks to @_Lucky45 - Optimized Screenshot uploading so BBHTool doesn't freeze while doing so - Optimized and updated Vendor.xml removal - Updated Android SDK link - Updated shrink for Croatian (Languages) and T-Mobile Name ID
v2.4.9.4 - Added APK Converter/Signer (PlayBook tab) - Added Drag/Drop and Clear button to File Swapper (Build-A-Hybrid tab) - Added option to Open OTA Downloader save folder after download - Changed .APK handling (PlayBook tab) - Changed functionality of the Settings -> Start Tab - Fixed warning messages that show for Latin (Default) font and Ringtones - Fixed Tweet Shrink Results/Tweet Shortened Link (Hopefully! Works with Chrome) - Fixes to "Put It Back" feature - Fixes to various shrink items - Updated Shrinking to work with OS 7.1 - Updated skins - Various minor UI fixes/adjustments
v2.4.9.3 - Added "Create Desktop Shortcut Button" to Start tab - Added ability to install .rem (app world backups) files to phone - Added deletion of new Vendor.Xml file - Added shrink items: Croatian (Languages), Latin Truetype (Fonts), PDFToGo (DocsToGo) - Fixed Backup/Restore of Third Party Apps (currently .jad only) - Updated JavaLoader.exe (from BlackBerry JDE 7.0 Beta 2) - Updated shrink for: Themes (Defaults), European (Fonts) - Updated Device dropdown list - Removed "SIM Card Capabilites" shrink
v2.4.9.2 - Added "Un/Check All" for BAR/APK installation - Added Java detection (for PlayBook tab) - Added Display Event Log checkbox to PlayBook for easier troubleshooting - Combined the .bar/.apk lib/platform-tools folders into one - Fixed Save .CODs/Save All .CODs crash upon completion - Improved .apk installation handling
v2.4.9.1 - Added App Read button to PlayBook - Added save App Read/Device Info to .txt buttons - Added launch .BAR after install option - Added progress bar to PlayBook tab - Added .APK installer for Android/Android Player on PlayBook - Added Launch Network Drive button - Fixed mutliple .BAR un/installation - Various GUI changes/fixes
v2.4.9 - Added feature to drag/drop .cod files to install to device in Phone Tools - Added PlayBook tab - allows install/uninstall of .BAR files, displays device info - Fixed passworded devices not being able to connect to Phone Tools - Fixed Offline Mode Hybrid Building/added confirmations and ChangedFiles folder - Fixed File System Read - now shows all files, and sortable - Fixed Languages not being remembered when app was re-opened - Fixed Select None not deselecting Advanced Options - Fixed tweets for BBHPlus not working - Moved Radio Swap to Build-A-Hybrid tab - Updated JavaLoader to latest included in 7.0 JDE - Updated HowTos
v2.4.8 - Added shrink for PIMClient by China Mobile (Apps) and G3eWalk by aspire-tech (Apps) - Updated tool tips for some items - Renamed "Defaults" group to "Media"
v2.4.7 - Added shrink for Amazon MP3 Music Store (OS7) - Updated shrinking for Backup Assisstant, Hindi, Vietnamese
v2.4.6 - Added more shrinking options: Engineering Screen (Advanced), News (Apps), Protect (Apps), Radio (Apps), Wireless Music Sync (Apps) - Fixed Setup Wizard shrink for OS5
v2.4.5 - Added progress bar to Phone Tools - Added checkbox in Create-A-JAD for when dragging alx/jads - Added Install-A-Hybrid tab (BETA) - Added "Take Screenshot" button, as well as "After Screenshot" options to the screenshot viewer - Added ability to copy screenshot to clipboard - Added shrinking options: Basque (language), Chinese Dictionary (Apps), Mobile Reader (Apps), Mobile Market (Apps) Global (font), Monotype (font) Thai (font) - Changes/fixes to various "Phone Tools" items - Fixed Copy to clipboard and Tweet after shortening under URL Shortening - Fixed "Save All" under Phone Tools so that the .cod files get copied to the folder correctly - Minor fixes/changes to skins/UI - Moved "OTA Upgrade" to Advanced shrink options - Updated shrinking for Default Videos, Setup Wizard, and Slacker - Renamed saved .txt's in Phone Tools (System Read, and Event Log) to include PIN of device it came from - Renamed folder for "Save All" under .COD Files to include PIN it came from ("Dump-PIN")
v2.4 - Added "Browse" to Create-A-JAD to browse for files instead of Drag & Drop - Added "Custom Shrink" button - see how-to for further info - Added "Offline Mode" for Build A Hybrid (use OS folders on PC) - Added "Restore Java" button to restore original Java folder - Added "Recover Memory" to "Phone Tools" tab - Added "Restore" for Third-Party Apps - Added @BBTweaks and @Driphter_Com to Latest Tweet choices - Added description to "Phone Tools" tab, as many users were not sure what was available - Added download links to "Latest BBHybrids" - Added file count to Shrink-A-OS - Added settings for all tabs to BBHToolSettings.ini - Added more URL shortening service choices: issimo.me, ota4.me, bl4q.me - Fixed Browse for settings file - Fixed handling of "&" in URL shortening - Fixed Phone Tools not connecting to phone with new JavaLoader - Fixed start-up message selection not being saved - Fixed Total Files count visibility in Phone Tools - Fixed some shrink items that were causing boot-up errors - Optimized Create-A-JAD code - Optimied Latest BBHybrid/Latest OS code - Optimized Tweet Pulling code - Updated How-to with info on new additions - Updated Save Apps, now creates .jad files as well - Various UI changes/fixes - Renamed Settings file to BBHToolSettings.ini
v2.3 - Added shrink support for Default 102DM Tree (Advanced option), Accessibility Options (Advanced option), Hindi language - Added "Latest OS" button to show latest OS available for your selected device - Added start-up message for new users to choose to go straight to Help - Changed Select All shortcut so that it does not conflict with Select All text (Ctrl + s) - Fixed issue with Indonesian language shrinking - Optimized Shrink/Put It Back to use MUCH less code = faster and more effective - Removed Message boxes displaying folder size before and after shrinking, now just displayed in info box in Shrink tab - Updated shrink for BB Maps, Bluetooth, Default Themes, S/MIME support, UK English, and Visual Voice Mail - Updated @bbleaks to @n4_bb (they changed names)
v2.2 - Added keyboard shortcuts for Help (F1), Select All (Ctrl + A), Select None (Ctrl + Del), Shrink My OS (Ctrl + Space) and Launch Loader (Ctrl +L) - Added How To/Help for all tabs - Added button to launch "DM" (Desktop Manager) - Added Progress bar to File Swapper - Added link to help in each tab - Re-organized Help Menu
v2.1 - Added 9780/9670 to Device Drop-down - Added Info about Shink My OS Live button (Click "?") - Added "Shrink All" box for Applications - Added Total shrunk amount - Added more shrinking options: Languages - Indonesian, Vietnamese; Apps: AT&T Hot Spot, DoD Certificates, Slacker, MemoPad, Suretype T12, Tasks; Fonts: Arabic, Indic, Japanese - Added "Swap Full Java" in File Swapper (B-a-H) - Added button to Refresh OS Folders beside the OS Folder box - Added, updated and corrected tool tips for many items - Cleaned up code to optimize various features - Fixed Tweet options to remove all the added "+"s - Modified ShrinkSettings.ini to be a bit more oganized
v2.0 - Added "Live Shrink" option - removes Shrink Options for device after its been installed to device - Added File Swapper to Build-A-Hybrid tab for easy OS file swapping - Added Shrink for Backgrounds[OS6], Backup Assisstant[OS6], Music[OS6], Startup Videos[OS6], Fonts[OS6], Feeds[OS6], Podcasts[OS6[, Movitalk[OS6], YouTube[OS6], and MySpace - Added "Tweet It" Option for OTAs created and uploaded with BBH Tool - Added "Tweet link after shrink" checkbox to URL shrinking - Fixed issue with URL Shrinking - Fixed "Phone Options" going missing when shrinking TTY in OS6 - Re-organized Shrink-A-OS
v1.9 - Added "Add 6.0 Files"/"Add 5.2 Files" buttons to add 6.0/5.2 files to your OS install - Added @bbleaks/@crackberry/Other Users Latest Tweets options - Added Screenshot Viewer w/ Upload/Shrink Link/Tweet Link Options - Added "T-Mobile Mobile Backup" Shrink option - Adjusted "Take Screenshot" file name to contain date, random numbers to prevent overwriting previous screenshots - Changed "BBH Tool is in current OS folder" to a drop-down menu option - Fixed Skins for Windows XP - Fixed issue where some languages were shrunk when you checked Remove All and unchecked the language - Renamed "Refresh" button to "Show Tweets" / "Find Latest Hybrid?" to "Latest BBHybrids" - Removed "Search" from "Over-The-Top" shrinking as it was causing bricks - Removed "Add To OS Install"
v1.8 - Added Skins menu (Default, Black/Grey, Black/Pink) - Added Option to Automatically Launch Loader after Shrink, Save Settings on Shrink - Added Change Log to Help menu - Added Url shortening choices - bb-h.me, tbz.me, l2s.cc, dcom.me - Added confirmation for "Wipe Device", Wipe/Factory Reset fonts red - Added "Save Apps" Button to Phone Tools - Added ToolStrip/MsgBox updates/confirmations for Phone Tools functions - Fixed Auto-Tweet after shrink - Fixed start-up error when no OSs were installed - Optimized various code
v1.7 - Fixed url shrinking for links with "+" in them - Added file system read/save read, event log read/save read, wipe, factory reset, etc. functions - Added "Tweet Shrink Results" button/Option to autotweet after shrink - Added MyFaves shrink option - Added "Over-The-Top" Shrink Options (Camera, Bluetooth, Search, Video Camera) [Hidden by default]
v1.6 - Added "OTA Downloader" with convert to .alx option - Added "Tweet My Link!" button for bb-h.me URL shortening - Added "@mattyg" option for tweets (@irtehun's are protected, so his won't work) - Fixed warning for BaH showing in OTA Downloader - Fixed and Added error handling to bb-h.me URL shrinking
v1.5 - Added Latest Tweets box (can choose @BBHybrids tweets or @theiexplorers) - Moved some buttons/checkboxes to the top Menu (Check for Updates, Suggestions, Always on Top) - Removed "Links" Menu item - Fixed issue with Create-A-JAD where files would not be moved when selected to
v1.4 - Added bb-h.me Link shrinking in "Other" tab (with custom URL option) - Added "Launch BBMCP" button - Optimized Check For Update/Fixed Check At Start-up - Removed/optimized some Swap-A-Radio code - Updated dead links to topics
V1.3 - Fixed issue where sometimes folders being selected from the dropdown were not actually changed - Fixed BBM shrinking - Fixed alignment of Total Files count in C-a-J - Added Shrink support for Lunar Calendar, more default themes, additional english - Zip it function should now work
v1.2 - Added Shrink support for App World, Mobile Stock, Music.cn, TeleNav, Verizon Push-To-Talk, Fetion - Added ability to Save/Load Shrink Settings to file - Minor bugfixes to C-A-J, Other Tab
